author: nataliaratnikova
body:
Please include new DMWMMON-datasvc release 1.1.1 in HG1607 , 
 it provides fix to https://github.com/dmwm/DMWMMON/issues/11 .
Code tested with slc6_amd64_gcc493 on a private testbed. 
rpm build tested and uploaded to the private apt-repo (user=ratnik). 

This pull request also includes new  spacemon-client spec, which is not part of cmsweb suite, but is good to have in the public cmsdist repo.
title: Hg1607 dmwmmon datasvc
